user.biography: Revolutionary homeschool curriculum making homeschooling beautiful, affordable, and easy

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 14, 2021. May be an image of book and text.

node.text:
**New Releases 25% Off: Ends Today!**

It’s your last chance to grab these four new-release books at 25% off! This summer sale from The Good and the Beautiful ends today, July 14, at 11:59 PM EST. Click the link in our bio to shop now!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 14, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'S”mply Simply MATH and Beautiful Good COURSE 2 BOOK Beautiful ွ Good QiP and Beautiful Beautful 9 10 MATH2 Good A 8 2- 3 6 5 4、 10 4+ Race RESCUE Divide HIGH Finish'.

node.text:
**Math 2: Available Now!**

Calling all second graders! Simply Good and Beautiful Math 2 was just released today! This innovative and already raved-about program is making homeschool math fun, easy to teach, and a must-have for many homeschool families. Learn more about Math 2, then add it to your cart at the link in our bio!

node.text:
**Flip-Through Video: Math 2**

We're excited to share another exciting math flip-through! Simply Good and Beautiful Math 2 is colorful and engaging. Be sure to check out the new Math 1 and Math 2 flip-through videos on our YouTube channel. (See link in bio.) Then watch your emails and our social media channels for release details. Math K–5 will be available on or before August 2, right in time for the new school year!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 13, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.text:
**Flip-Through Video: Math 1**

It’s time to get excited about Simply Good and Beautiful Math! Be sure to check out the new Math 1 flip-through video on our YouTube channel. (See link in bio.) Then watch your emails and our social media channels for release details. Math K–5 will be available on or before August 2, right in time for the new school year!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 12, 2021. May be an illustration.

node.text:
**Celebrate Poetry: New Book 25% Off!**

Use our exciting new “Poetry Parties for Littles” book to plan a nature-themed poetry party for preschool children! This lovely book has already captured the hearts of many families and is filled with sweet poems, simple craft ideas, and shopping lists! It is 25% off for two more days and available only from The Good and the Beautiful! Get your copy today at the link in our bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 08, 2021. May be an image of book and text.

node.text:
**Sale Extended! Exciting New Books!**

Our four new books have been extremely popular, so we’re giving everyone another week to grab them at 25% off! This summer sale ends July 14 at midnight EST. Find the new-release books—and many more classic and original titles—only in The Good and the Beautiful Library!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 07, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.text:
**Storytime: More Free Books Added for Summer!**

Encourage summer reading with The Good and the Beautiful Storytime! Four new audiobooks have been added to our unique (and free!) collection of classic children’s stories. Click the link in our bio to visit The Good and the Beautiful Storytime today!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'America the Beautiful -lics'.

node.text:
**New on the Blog: Celebrate 4th of July!**

Learn the inspiring story behind the beloved “America the Beautiful” song and then download a free Declaration of Independence study guide (an activity from our upcoming US Constitution & Government Course). These two new blog posts from The Good and the Beautiful are just in time for the 4th of July! Click the link in our bio to read the first post.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on July 01, 2021. May be an image of book and text.

node.text:
**New Books for Summer Reading!**

It’s a summer sale! Our four new releases are 25% off until July 7, 2021, at midnight EST. Find these reprinted classic titles and the exciting, brand-new Poetry Parties for Littles only in The Good and the Beautiful Library! See the link in our bio for details.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on June 28, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'H PENCIL GRIP How & Why To Teach It'.

node.text:
**Pencil Grip & Sight Words: On the Blog!**

Two new blog posts have been added! Learn how to teach proper pencil grip (with two new videos from Jenny Phillips). Then, download free kindergarten sight word posters and activities on our second new post. Click the link in our bio to start reading!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on June 28, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Good THE AND Beautiful FOLLOW US ON PINTEREST'.

node.text:
**We’re on Pinterest!**

The Good and the Beautiful is on Pinterest! Find your favorite curriculum, free downloads, library books, and much more. Pin and follow us at the link in our bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on June 23, 2021.

node.text:
**Simply Good and Beautiful Math K: Available Now!**

The first Simply Good and Beautiful Math course is available now! This brand-new homeschool math program features interactive lessons that are easy to teach and the perfect length for young learners. Our pilot families raved about this exciting new kindergarten course! Find Math K at the link in our bio.
